source:
TEXT_LUCKZJ020_03583_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
Pegshs Ooan fears an interloper may be about...
target:
TEXT_LUCKZJ020_03583_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var>特殊ルール： レベルアジャスト<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
オンドの潮溜まりのペグスィー・オーンは、怪しい者を見かけたようだ。
TEXT_LUCKZJ020_03583_TODO_02<tab>オンド族の新米番兵と話す
TEXT_LUCKZJ020_03583_TODO_04<tab>ペグスィー・オーンと話す

source: TEXT_LUCKZJ020_03583_PEGSHSOOAN_000_000<tab>Tell me, finless one: have you seen a shhhifty-eyed Ondo lurking about?
target:
TEXT_LUCKZJ020_03583_PEGSHSOOAN_000_000<tab>もし、そこのヒト。
付近で、怪しげな、オンド、見なかったか。

source: TEXT_LUCKZJ020_03583_PEGSHSOOAN_000_001<tab>I have, as have others. The Cups is home to a sssmall community, and ssstrangers do not go unnoticed. I can but assume that one of those lawless outsiders is attempting to pass as one of us...
target:
TEXT_LUCKZJ020_03583_PEGSHSOOAN_000_001<tab>我、怪しげなオス、見た。
期せずして、穴蔵住まう、オンド、
すなわち、フラウンダーが、紛れこんだやも、しれぬ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZJ020_03583_PEGSHSOOAN_000_002<tab>I cannot go about and sssearch on account of my duties here, but if you could conduct an investigation in my stead I would be most grateful. I sssuggest you begin by speaking with the guard at the southern entrance.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZJ020_03583_PEGSHSOOAN_000_002<tab>警備の任、離れられないため、貴君に、捜査、頼みたい。
こちらから、出ていった様子、ないため、
南の出口の「オンド族の番兵」のもと、行ってほしい。

source: TEXT_LUCKZJ020_03583_PEGSHSOOAN_000_005<tab>That outsider is still here among us. Sssomewhere. I can feel it in my fins. Nevertheless, it is only prudent that you speak with my comrade to the south and confirm my sssuspicions.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZJ020_03583_PEGSHSOOAN_000_005<tab>怪しげなオンド、見たが、警備の任、離れられない。
ゆえ、貴君に、捜査、願いたい。
聞き込み、頼む。

source: TEXT_LUCKZJ020_03583_ONDOSOLDIERA03583_000_010<tab>A shhhifty-eyed Ondo, you say? I have seen no such individual. I can but presume they are still somewhere here, in the Cups...
target:
TEXT_LUCKZJ020_03583_ONDOSOLDIERA03583_000_010<tab>なに、怪しい、オンドだと。
それらしい者、出入りした様子、ない。
まだ、潮溜まりの中、いるのではないか？

source: TEXT_LUCKZJ020_03583_ONDOSOLDIERA03583_000_011<tab>There is an elder who prides himself on knowing every sssoul here. If there is a new arrival here, he will have noted their passing.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZJ020_03583_ONDOSOLDIERA03583_000_011<tab>それなら、オンドの古顔、いつも潮溜まり、いる。
なにか、知っているかもしれない。
「老齢のオンド族」のもと、行くといい。

source: TEXT_LUCKZJ020_03583_ONDOSOLDIERA03583_000_015<tab>Seek out and speak with that elder. Nosy he may be, but in times such as these his presssumptuous nature may be to our advantage.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZJ020_03583_ONDOSOLDIERA03583_000_015<tab>怪しいオンド、まだ、潮溜まりの中、いるのではないか？
「老齢のオンド族」のもと、行ってみると、いい。

source: TEXT_LUCKZJ020_03583_OLDONDOPEOPLE03583_000_020<tab>A suspicious outsider? Nay, I have seen none─other than you, of course, heh heh. But if he has not somehow eluded the gate guards, then the only other explanation is that he has gone to ground in the caverns below. Mayhap you should ssspeak with the youngling guard stationed near the entrance.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZJ020_03583_OLDONDOPEOPLE03583_000_020<tab>怪しいオンド、か？　いや、見ておらん。
潮溜まり、いないなら、深き底、かもしれん。
「オンド族の新米番兵」に話、聞くべし。

source: TEXT_LUCKZJ020_03583_OLDONDOPEOPLE03583_000_025<tab>As I told you, I have seen no shifty-eyed Ondo outsiders. If he is here, I sssuspect he has gone into the caverns below─question the guard near the entrance and see what he has to say.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZJ020_03583_OLDONDOPEOPLE03583_000_025<tab>怪しいオンド、か？　いや、見ておらん。
潮溜まり、いないなら、深き底、かもしれん。
「オンド族の新米番兵」に話、聞くべし。

source: TEXT_LUCKZJ020_03583_ONDOSOLDIERB03583_000_030<tab>Eh? A shhhifty-eyed Ondo? Now that you mention it, there was this one fellow who seemed to be in a bit of a hurry. I waved him on by, thinking nothing of it. Say...is he one of those raiders? I hope not...
target:
TEXT_LUCKZJ020_03583_ONDOSOLDIERB03583_000_030<tab>えと、怪しいオンド、ですか？
たしかに、ソワソワしたオンド、通りました。
でも、フラウンダーのオンドっぽくは、なかった、ような……？

source: TEXT_LUCKZJ020_03583_ONDOSOLDIERB03583_000_031<tab>Well, I should probably ssstay here just in case he tries to come back out. If you want to catch him, you will need to head down there by yourself.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZJ020_03583_ONDOSOLDIERB03583_000_031<tab>彼なら、ここからもっと深く、底の方、向かいました。
探してみて、ください。

source: TEXT_LUCKZJ020_03583_ONDOSOLDIERB03583_000_035<tab>Much as I would love to assist you, I cannot. I have my responsssibilities too, you know...
target:
TEXT_LUCKZJ020_03583_ONDOSOLDIERB03583_000_035<tab>彼なら、ここからもっと深く、底の方、向かいました。
探してみて、ください。

source: TEXT_LUCKZJ020_03583_ONDOPEOPLE03583_000_040<tab>Who goes there!? A finless one? What business have you with me!?
target:
TEXT_LUCKZJ020_03583_ONDOPEOPLE03583_000_040<tab>う、わ！
ヒトが、なんの、用だ……！

source: TEXT_LUCKZJ020_03583_ONDOPEOPLE03583_000_041<tab>I-I am no missscreant! I came here in secret that I might practice with this spear away from prying eyes. 'Twas a gift presssented to me by a finless one I saved from drowning.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZJ020_03583_ONDOPEOPLE03583_000_041<tab>お、俺、フラウンダーじゃ、ない……！
溺れてたヒト、助けたとき、もらった槍、
こっそり、振ってみたかった、だけ……！

source: TEXT_LUCKZJ020_03583_ONDOPEOPLE03583_000_042<tab>It is rather more flamboyant than those of traditional Ondo make, and so I feared that others might judge me harshly for it...
target:
TEXT_LUCKZJ020_03583_ONDOPEOPLE03583_000_042<tab>この槍、オンドが使うものより派手で、恥ずかしい。
だから、ほかのオンド、いないところで、
振ってみたくて……。

source: TEXT_LUCKZJ020_03583_ONDOPEOPLE03583_000_043<tab>I did not wish to give so many cause to worry, but I see now that I have. I shall go and apologize to Pegshs Ooan. You should speak with him after─he will doubtless want to thank you for your ssservice.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZJ020_03583_ONDOPEOPLE03583_000_043<tab>紛らわしいことして、申し訳ない。
「ペグスィー・オーン」にも、謝ってくる。
君も来て、なにかお礼、もらうといい。

source: TEXT_LUCKZJ020_03583_PEGSHSOOAN_000_050<tab>And so the myssstery is solved. The little one explained all to me.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZJ020_03583_PEGSHSOOAN_000_050<tab>怪しげなオンド、フラウンダーでは、なかったようだな。
さっき、潮溜まりのオンドのひとり、謝りにきた。

source: TEXT_LUCKZJ020_03583_PEGSHSOOAN_000_051<tab>It may seem extreme for me to be so sssuspicious, but we must ever be vigilant for infiltrators. For our sake and for yours.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZJ020_03583_PEGSHSOOAN_000_051<tab>潮溜まりのオンド、フラウンダー、相容れぬ。
フラウンダーはヒト、憎んでいるゆえ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZJ020_03583_PEGSHSOOAN_000_052<tab>Whatever hatred and resentment they bear towards us is dwarfed by that which they harbor for your kind. The Flood of Light was the work of finless ones, and so they hold you responsible for robbing them of their homes.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZJ020_03583_PEGSHSOOAN_000_052<tab>「光の氾濫」起きて、故郷を追われたの、ヒトのせい。
だから許せないと、フラウンダー、思ってる。
でも我ら、ヒトがみんな、悪いわけではないと、わかってる。

source: TEXT_LUCKZJ020_03583_PEGSHSOOAN_000_053<tab>We know better, and in time, they will too, I pray. But, for now, you must go with caution, honored guessst...
target:
TEXT_LUCKZJ020_03583_PEGSHSOOAN_000_053<tab>オマエも、悪いやつじゃなかった。
潮溜まりの平穏、守ってくれて、感謝する。
